SECTION.SUBTITLE: 14. Pixmania service: the Zen Engagement
SECTION.SUBTEXT:
Independently to the legal guarantees stipulated in the article 12, Pixmania gives you the opportunity to register for the Zen Engagement.
You may only register for the Zen Engagement when you purchase a new product on www.pixmania.com. Products covered by the Zen Engagement can be easily identified on the site www.pixmania.com.
What is the Zen Engagement? Advantages of the Zen Engagement: 1. If you find your product for less on another website within 7 days of purchase, Pixmania will refund you the difference. 2. If your product develops a fault within 12 months of purchase, Pixmania will refund the total amount you paid. 3. You can trade in your old product.
Application conditions 1. Price matching: Price matching only applies in the following ranges: CAMERAS, CAMCORDERS, SOUND & VISION, COMPUTING and TELEPHONY (accessories and consumables not included). If you find the same product (same brand, same model and same version or edition immediately available) for less on another UK website within 7 days of purchasing it on www.pixmania.com, Pixmania will refund you the difference.
The product must be identical, new and cheaper. The product must include the same accessories and equivalent warranty and the price must be lower exclude shipping fees. The price of the product is the price displayed (including V.A.T.) excluding discounts such as promotional codes, gift vouchers and any other special offers such as stock clearance or sales. This offer is limited to one refund per household for each product purchase on www.pixmania.com.
Products from websites based on bidding systems or classified ads placed by individuals and/or products delivered outside of the UK are not included.
To request a refund, simply send us a copy of your invoice, a printout of the page on the website with the same, cheaper product as you purchased on www.pixmania.com (printouts of price comparison websites will not be accepted) and your bank details (bank name, account holder name, SWIFT and IBAN).
Once your details have been confirmed and the withdrawal period has been exceeded, we will refund you the difference between the product you purchased on www.pixmania.com and the price you found on another site in the UK according to the above conditions, by bank transfer.
2. Refund if your product develops a fault in the first year: This service is valid for a year on all faults that are not covered by legal conformity guarantees concerning latent defects. Only one refund can be issued.
If your product develops a fault following the date of purchase, you have 12 months to request a refund on the site www.pixmania.com. You can use the refunded amount to purchase another item in our website.
The product must be returned to Pixmania in its full, original packaging (with user guide, cables and CD-ROM, etc.), so technical tests can be carried out within 15 days to identify the cause of the fault. If, after testing, the fault is identified as not being covered by the warranty (because it shows signs of shock, oxidation, wrong use, etc.), no refund will be issued. An invoice will be issued by the manufacturer; if you refuse the invoice, you will be requested to pay administration fees. If you agree to the invoice, you will need to send the required amount to Pixmania by bank transfer.
In the event where your refund request is accepted by our service, the total amount you paid for your order will be credited to your bank account within a few days. The amount credited will be equal to the value of your product excluding shipping fees. You can use the credit to purchase any of the products from Pixmania's catalogue.
To return your product or request a refund, you must contact Pixmania's After-Sales service from Monday to Friday between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m. - on 0844 369 0372 (calls charged at a local rate when using a landline phone - From Monday to Friday between 9a.m. and 5p.m.) - or by e-mail through the “contact us” section available on the homepage of www.pixmania.com. Our customer service team will give you all the information you need to return your product.
3. You can trade in your old product: If you purchased a product covered by the Zen Engagement, we can take it back and issue a refund. You can request for your product to be traded in by using the form available in the Pix & I section.
You may not trade in products in the following ranges: accessories, components, spare parts and consumables. You may only trade in products with a value of over £160, excluding products that are purchased as part of a promotional pack, bundle or special offer.
Once we have received and checked your request, we will send you an e-mail, authorising you to return your product.
You must then send us your product at your own expense, with all its original accessories. Pixmania's customer services team will carry out a technical inspection to see whether your product is in good condition.
A product that is scratched or shows signs of damage or shock will not be traded in and will be returned by Pixmania to the customer at Pixmania's expense (return costs from the customer to Pixmania remain at the client's expense).
